import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import seven from '../../assets/images/user/7.jpg'; import profileImg from '../../assets/images/other-images/profile-style-img3.png'; import blog from "../../assets/images/blog/img.png"; import Tour from 'reactour'; import { disableBodyScroll, enableBodyScroll } from "body-scroll-lock"; import Breadcrumb from '../common/breadcrumb'; const TourComponent = () => { const [isTourOpen, setIsTourOpen] = useState(true); const closeTour = () => { setIsTourOpen(false); } const [url, setUrl] = useState(); const readUrl = (event) => { if (event.target.files.length === 0) return; //Image upload validation var mimeType = event.target.files[0].type; if (mimeType.match(/image\/*/) == null) { return; } // Image upload var reader = new FileReader(); reader.readAsDataURL(event.target.files[0]); reader.onload = (_event) => { setUrl(reader.result) } } const disableBody = target => disableBodyScroll(target); const enableBody = target => enableBodyScroll(target); const steps = [ { selector: '.pro', content: 'This is Profile Image', }, { selector: '.icon-wrapper', content: 'Edit Profile Image', }, { selector: '.detail', content: 'Profile Detail', }, { selector: '.social-media', content: 'This is Your social details', }, { selector: '.firstPost', content: 'This is you first post' } // ... ] return (
{/* */}
readUrl(e)} />

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source .Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text.
